Class Earth

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      Earth

public class Earth
extends greenfoot.World

This is Earth. Or at least some remote, uninhabited part of Earth. Here, Greeps can land and look for piles of tomatoes...

Version:
1.0 Yu-Ching's Version
Author:
Michael Kolling
